title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1472/98 of 9 July 1998 amending Regulation (EC) No 2300/97 on detailed rules to implement Council Regulation (EC) No 1221/97 laying down general rules for the application of measures to improve the production and the marketing of honey
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1472/98 of 9 July 1998 amending Regulation (EC) No 2300/97 on detailed rules to implement Council Regulation (EC) No 1221/97 laying down general rules for the application of measures to improve the production and the marketing of honey
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 5 of Regulation (EC) No 2300/97 is replaced by the following:
'Article 5
The agricultural conversion rate to be applied to the amount referred to in Article 3 shall be the rate in force on 1 May of the year in which the programme is notified.`

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 July 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
